article_title: Cops shoot 2 pit bulls after they attack young girl
article_text:
NEW BRUNSWICK — Two pit bulls were shot and killed by police after they mauled and seriously injured a young girl at a central New Jersey home.

Middlesex County Prosecutor Andrew Carey said the attack occurred Thursday night in New Brunswick, but did not say what sparked the incident. He said the 4-year-old girl remained hospitalized yesterday in critical condition.

Further details on her injuries were not disclosed by officials yesterday.
